en-US.summary: Control your garage door with voice commands
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask garage door to press the button
Alexa, ask garage door for status
Alexa, ask garage door what's the status
en-US.name: Garage Door Controller
en-US.description: Control your IoT garage door opener using voice commands. Press the garage door button, check door status, and receive notifications when the door has been open for extended periods. Requires Particle Argon hardware and AWS backend.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This skill requires physical Particle Argon hardware with garage door relay. For testing, ensure the device 'garage-door-opener' is online and accessible.
